Content.Title: Gameplay
Text: The game is a 3D platformer where you explore acient ruins and solve puzzels. You use WASD to move, space to jump, and E to interact.

Content.Title: Synopsis
Text: Due to this being the first game jam we ever did (and first time working with unreal) we only have an intro level and one puzzel level.

Content.Title: Notable Features
Text: You can choose between two different characters at the start of the game.
The intro scene tells the story of the game while you walk.
You can break small boxes by stepping on them.
